General.Name: Modi Rubber Limited
General.Description: Modi Rubber Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automobile tires, tubes, and flaps in India. It also offers resin coated sand; and operates salons. The company was incorporated in 1971 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: 4-7C, DDA Shopping Centre, New Delhi, India, 110025
